ResearchProjectDef.label: Statues of the Evil Sisters
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to construct a statue of Nightmare Moon, who will grant you exotic items in exchange for chocolate, as well as a statue of Daybreaker, who will convert 100 of one material (or 1000 silver) into its market value equivalent of another.\n\nSome recipes at these items will require additional research before they are unlocked; see descriptions of each for details.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
Nightmare Moon allows you to request many exotic items using chocolate, though it does work out to be more expensive than acquiring them normally. It is handy if your pawns don't have the necessary skills, or if you have excess chocolate and need something urgently.

Some items can also be returned to the statue in exchange for a small amount of chocolate.

Many items, such as bionic limbs and skilltrainers, can only be requested once other research has been completed.

Daybreaker allows you to convert 100 of steel, plasteel, uranium, jade and gold into the market value equivalent of another. For example, 100 steel can be turned into:

- 38 jade
- 21 plasteel
- 32 uranium
- 19 gold

You can also convert 1000 silver into the market value equivalent of these materials, like so:

- 200 jade
- 526 steel
- 111 plasteel
- 167 uranium
- 100 gold

You can also convert these same amounts into 1000 silver, which is useful if you have an excess of one thing and want to turn it into something else.

Once you have researched the necessary techs, you can also use the Daybreaker statue to rapidly create 5/10 regular or advanced components.

Please note that all of the recipes Daybreaker can perform also require 75 chemfuel, or 150 if making 10 components, though this amount can be configured to your liking if you use the XML Extensions mod.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Request skilltrainers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Nightmare Moon will grant you the ability to request skilltrainers from her.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Chemfuel-based beer brewing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the ability to create a large quantity of beer at the Daybreaker statue.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Magic mirror
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the secrets of the magic mirror which connects Equestria to a whole other world.
